descriptionHtml:
**********
***FR****
**********

Bonjour,
Ce Mod ajoute des tigres dans Tamriel, ainsi qu\'une mini quete qui permet de decouvrir des sorts de conjuration pour invoquer 3 sortes de tigre pour 900 secondes.
Il y a des tigres et des tigres blanc, avec leurs petit.
Ce mod ne remplace rien au jeux, toutes les textures et meshes sont unique, ce qui dois le rendre compatible avec n\'importe quel mod...sauf:


Ce mod n\'est pas compatible avec mes 2 autres mods :


Panthera tigris altaica : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13806
et
Tiger Race in Tamriel :  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13674

Si vous avez deja l\'un de ces mods, il suffit de remplacer les fichiers existant.

J\'ai cre√© une version francaise et une anglaise avec l\'aide de Appolyn (merci a toi Appo)

Installation :
-----------------

extraire l\'archive dans le dossier Skyrim et activer  Tigre Race.esp.
Votez si vous aimez .
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**********
***EN***
**********

This Mod adds tigers in Tamriel, and a mini quest to discover who makes lots of conspiracy to invoke three kinds of tiger for 900 seconds.
There are tigers and white tigers , with their baby.

This mod does not replace anything in the game, all the textures and meshes are unique, which should make it compatible with any mod ... except:


This mod is not compatible with my other 2 mods


Panthera tigris altaica : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13806
and
Tiger Race in Tamriel :  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13674
If you already have one of these mods, just replace the existing file.

I created a French version and English with the help of Appolyn (thank you to you Appo)

I have not invaded Tamriel, I put in some places



===============
installation
===============
Extract the archive in the Skyrim directory and active tigre race.esp




=========
NOTES
=========

Sorry for my English French.
Approve if you wish.

known Issues
No bugs detected when I tested it in the CK. All meshes and textures are unique and must be compatible with mods.

Thank to \"muppetpuppet \" for his Free Textures 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10473

Thank you to The Nexus
Thank you in Bethesda
Thank you to you to check my mod! 
My Mods:
Dangerous Slaughterfish Races HD : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11883

Scary Hagraven : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4685

Slaughterfish Mod V2 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4678
author: Zbenji
